post.body: Singstar make you say stuff you wish you never said. Margaux "Attends mais, tu mets Christophe Maé, je fais 10000".
Our camera guide is online on Lense ! - http://ping.fm/Rzg2e
Otter Horoscope hiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii - http://ping.fm/bdFFt
escaping work for a rendez vous with her
Working on DK8 Project, I love to be a Creative Director again.
Haha, Goro Daimon is back in KoF XII, beware future opponents, don't even try to jump on meh :D
Meeting with Leo and Ben to brinstorm a special Technikart issue and then preparing the Nikon event.
Being caught by one of these little, though effective urges to build a Lego. A big one.
OMG SNOW IT MUST BE FROM OBAMA
On my way to Lili & Lele party.
From a friend of mine, sperm donator : "Nan mais vraiment, quand ça part, j'ai vraiment l'impression d'aider"
Special K or yesterday's cold Pizza ?
Lunch with @monsieurdream, who shares my passions : geek, tendance, buzz, marketing, hype, apple, adds, fashion, 2.0, monetize and so on.
I wanna Guitar Hero World Tour tonight, who's in ?
She's so cut with my beanie <3
On my way to Talkie Walkie "Playlist" expo.
Canon 5D markII or Nikon D3x : my mind can't breath, my wallet has already jumped through the window.
This uncanny cold calls for cuddles and hot cacao.
Off to Volley Ball. SUIT - WAIT FOR IT - UP !
My car is almost empty, Stateless "Fall Into You" is in my ears. Lovely conditions to write my column for Cosmopolitan.
Media accredidation for Macworld : On. Come on Steve, announce something really fun o/
Lunch, rendez-vous, net, work, emails, mails. Where's'the nap in there ?
The only Vietnamese guy known in France is dead. Too bad people still call him "Le Chinois". RIP - http://ping.fm/5cPUQ
Unlocking characters and harvesting bonuses in Naruto Storm like when I was 14. 24.
Let's GoW 2 war. (my humor is worth their lines)
Just woke up. Sorry guys for the movie :(
Working with Adadad on Divide's heir.
Back from LG Lunch, now at GQ, then at Infuse, but just after Negatif Plus.
Best #leweb report ? Don't know, but I lmao real hard xD - http://ping.fm/lf8Kg
Dragon Ball movie trailer : let's start crying tears of blood T.T - http://ping.fm/tuP4k
Stop blogging, start reading - http://ping.fm/lDv3F
Netvibes party top Topics : 1. "Looking for money !" 2. "Looking for devs !" 3. "Looking for free beers !"
Working on this caritative Lense Party. Not easy to help people.
Supreme looser of the day : I applied.
Too many people tell me that Géraldine Lemeur was dressed like a whore at LeWeb. Damn, that's gore. Damn, need .jpg !
Mini Lense, for photo lovers, but photo beginners - http://ping.fm/oH1uL
"5D mark II" has arrived.
One of the first blog I discovered is the one I enjoy more and more everyday : <3 Boulet
Still at Ikea, waiting for the ONE missing item. Predictable.
With great news come great HIBILIBLIBITITIES :))
Looks like EOS 5D MarkII is everything I expected : fantastic sensor wrapped with cheapness.
Nothing's gonna stop me now. I mean, not the Samantha Fox song.
Guitar Hero World Tour, Rock Band 2, my brother and his guitar : spent the week end singing <3
Pawnning @edwood and @astigo at Street Fighter 3.3. Routiiiineeee !
No one likes his bank. I fucking hate mine : Caisse d'Epargne you are suckers.
Beware the Koalas.
AAW, AW AW AWWWWWWWWWW - http://ping.fm/7zYYT
Singing with my brothers. Awful o//
Working while watching a documentary on snakes. I love Snakes docs : gross, beautiful, brilliant, sneaky.
Oh shit, photo post processing > natural sleeping needs. Wonder if I should go to bed.
Waking up when the Sun goes down.
Saturday Night Dive (in your bed).
Mini Lense today, the instructors are late already -.-V
First photo shoot for Technikart done. Now peeing in mah pants playing Dead Space with @dopple & sskizo
150 euros to hold the next 7 days, Christmas included. It's not Pekin Express, it's my life :'(
Every second I spend on my laptop is a second I don't spend in my bed. Go go, act.
A.B.C : Always Be Cool. Or Cute.
My Todo > Obama's Todo.
